Incorporate noise-cancellation technology: Add advanced noise-cancellation technology to the headphones to help users block out external noise and focus on their audio. This feature can be especially useful for people who work in noisy environments or enjoy listening to music in public spaces.
Develop a wireless version: Create a wireless version of the headphones that eliminates the need for cords and wires, providing a more convenient and clutter-free listening experience.

Add touch controls: Incorporate touch controls on the headphones, allowing users to control their music and calls without having to reach for their device. This feature can be especially useful for people who want to avoid taking their device out of their pocket or bag.

Introduce a voice assistant integration: Create a headphone with a built-in voice assistant, such as Amazon's Alexa or Google Assistant, allowing users to control their music, make calls, and access other smart features without having to use their device.
